itemInfo.itemDesc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Coastal Cave, Coastal Cliff, Northern Heidel Quarry, Southern Cienaga, Hexe Stone Wall, and Abandoned Iron Mine. It can be directly obtained from Ore containing Iron.

item.name: Iron Ore Crate
item.desc: A Trade Item containing 10 Iron Ore.

item.name: Topaz Ring
item.desc: A ring decorated with a Topaz.

item.name: Ruby Ring
item.desc: A ring decorated with a Ruby.

item.name: Topaz Earrings
item.desc: An earring decorated with a Topaz.

item.name: Ruby Earrings
item.desc: An earring decorated with a Ruby.

item.name: Iron Ingot
item.desc:
A processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Melted Iron Shards. It requires knowledge of Heating: Beginner.
※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.
※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Apprentice Level 4 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Melted Iron Shard
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Iron Ore.
